page.title: 16SOCIAL LIFE IN DEEPCAR
page.content: {ENTERTAINMENT}for this area includes many activities organised by the local church, the 3 public houses and the Lowood's W.M. club.{St. John's Church has special musical evenings, pea and pie suppers, whist drives and numerous fund-raising events. The three{Public {Houses}play a major part by arranging quiz nights, folk song evenings and fancy dress parties.{The Lowood's {working men's club}has a regular amateur dramatic show, plus frequent bingo sessions and professional entertainers.{Deepcar Mixed Voice {Choir,}which originated 57 years ago as a male voice choir and 7 years ago invited ladies to become members. The choir entertains at many functions in and around the area. The local{Golf {Club}has its own social club which provides meals and entertainment for its members.
